oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baird, John, 1825 April 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of John Baird, of Davidson County, Tennessee, dated September 8th, 1822. Illustrates the first page of the document. This will was probated in the Davidson County Court on April 9th, 1825 (WB 8:407). Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baird family
